Thor.title: Thor
Thor.actors: Chris Hemsworth, Anthony Hopkins, Natalie Portman
Thor.plot: The powerful but arrogant god Thor is cast out of Asgard to live amongst humans in Midgard (Earth), where he soon becomes one of their finest defenders.

The Shawshank Redemption.title: The Shawshank Redemption
The Shawshank Redemption.actors: Tim Robbins, Morgan Freeman, Bob Gunton
The Shawshank Redemption.plot: Over the course of several years, two convicts form a friendship, seeking consolation and, eventually, redemption through basic compassion.
The Shawshank Redemption.awards: Nominated for 7 Oscars. 21 wins & 43 nominations total

Batman.title: Batman
Batman.actors: Michael Keaton, Jack Nicholson, Kim Basinger
Batman.plot: The Dark Knight of Gotham City begins his war on crime with his first major enemy being Jack Napier, a criminal who becomes the clownishly homicidal Joker.

Superman.title: Superman
Superman.actors: Christopher Reeve, Margot Kidder, Gene Hackman
Superman.plot: An alien orphan is sent from his dying planet to Earth, where he grows up to become his adoptive home's first and greatest superhero.
Superman.awards: Nominated for 3 Oscars. 17 wins & 23 nominations total
